physical_appearance:This is a portrait photograph of a Burmese woman. She is standing in the middle
 with her right arm holding on to the back of a wooden chair. She is wearing a flowery head piece
 earrings
 necklaces
 a long sleeved top and a wrapped skirt with shoes. Her left hand is holding on to the skirt. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a portrait photograph of a Burmese woman. She is standing in the middle, with her right arm holding on to the back of a wooden chair. She is wearing a flowery head piece, earrings, necklaces, a long sleeved top and a wrapped skirt with shoes. Her left hand is holding on to the skirt. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
